messages.text:
*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=fd51d6123dfa ***

doc: add mention of the Go+ community

R=golang-dev, iant, kamil.kisiel, minux.ma
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/7203049

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

https://codereview.appspot.com/7203049/diff/1/doc/contrib.html File doc/contrib.html (right): https://codereview.appspot.com/7203049/diff/1/doc/contrib.html#newcode97 doc/contrib.html:97:

The Go+ community

I don't think plus.sandbox.google.com is right. Try it on a browser where you aren't logged into your google account.

https://codereview.appspot.com/7203049/diff/1/doc/contrib.html File doc/contrib.html (right): https://codereview.appspot.com/7203049/diff/1/doc/contrib.html#newcode97 doc/contrib.html:97:

The Go+ community

https://plus.google.com/communities/114112804251407510571 is the URL for us regular people. Can't access the one linked here.

Ugh. I made a mental note to edit that link but got distracted. Thanks. On 24 Jan 2013 18:48, wrote: > > https://codereview.appspot.**com/7203049/diff/1/doc/**contrib.html > File doc/contrib.html (right): > > https://codereview.appspot.**com/7203049/diff/1/doc/** > contrib.html#newcode97 > doc/contrib.html:97:

href="https://plus.sandbox.**google.com/**112164155169467723645/posts > ">**The > Go+ community

> https://plus.google.com/**communities/**114112804251407510571is the URL for > us regular people. Can't access the one linked here. > > https://codereview.appspot.**com/7203049/ >

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, iant@golang.org, kamil.kisiel@gmail.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

subject: code review 7203049: doc: add mention of the Go+ community
